## About us

### The art of beauty is to exude confidence and comfort in your skin. Falling
in love with the majesty that reflects in the mirror. Our Laser Love family
creates a safe space to receive quality hair removal services that awaken
courage and sensuality in being hair-free.  
  
We are equipped with a team of trained professionals that listen to your
needs, understand your concerns, and provide personal laser removal that meets
your unique preferences. Schedule a free consultation and trial treatment or
just jump right in and leave it to us care free. Hair free guaranteed!  
  

meet the family

SERVICES

## is a more effective, longer-lasting Just about permanent method to remove
unwanted hair using laser light technology.

# HydraFacial®

## ACHIEVE THE Healthiest SKIN OF YOUR LIFE Combining beauty and TECHNOLOGY
Providing the best results you have ever seen

## Laser Hair Removal

LEARN more

LEARN more

How It Works

The heat of the laser damages / weakens the root of the hair

Resulting in less hair growth

After so many times your hairs are too weak to grow

See us LIVE on Social Media

Instagram

Tiktok

faq

  
01 WHY LASER HAIR REMOVAL?  
  

• It permanently reduces 10-15% of hair per treatment  
• It's safe, easy & proven effective [FDA approved]  
• Softens & smooths your skin  
• Saves you time & money by not shaving or waxing  
• Say goodbye to ingrown hairs, knicks and bumps

  
02 NERVOUS?  
  

Don’t be, our team of licensed and certified estheticians perform over a
thousand treatments a year. You are in safe hands :)

  
03 WILL IT HURT?  
  

Pain free laser is here.  
  
Thank you science. SHR™ - Alma's proprietary hair removal innovation is the
only clinically proven method of laser hair removal that is virtually
painless. Most of our clients say they feel nothing at all and some a
tolerable prickling sensation.  
  
ICE Plus Continuous Contact Cooling system is an advanced technology that
continuously cools skin and facilitates range-controlled temperature
throughout the entire treatment. Patients can now enjoy a completely pain-
free, cool and comfortable experience throughout the session.

  
04 WHAT WILL YOUR RESULTS LOOK LIKE?  
  

You will see an immediate decrease in hair growth from your first treatment
however as you continue treatment after treatment your results dramatically
increase. Depending on a few factors we can attain hair free for you in 8-12
treatments.

READ MORE

studio

### TAKE A LOOK INSIDE

  *   * 

  *   *   *   *   * 

REVIEWS

  *   * 

Service: Laser hair removal

  

Amazing spa like experience! I’ve tried many laser hair removal places in
Brooklyn and none are even in the stratosphere of Laser Love. The staff is
incredibly professional and knowledgeable at what they do and the equipment
itself was not only pain free but by far the best results I’ve ever seen. I
also did the Hydra Facial which was not only a great experience but it gave me
a spa like feel allowing me to walk out of Laser Love completely relaxed and
rejuvenated. I recommend this 10 out of 10 and kudos to David for creating a
really enjoyable experience for laser which has always been a sub par
experience to say the least!

Eli Bensoussan

Maayan at Laser Love is absolutely fantastic! She provided an exceptional
experience during my visit. Her professionalism, attention to detail, and warm
personality made the entire process comfortable and enjoyable. I highly
recommend her services and can't thank her enough for the great care she
provided.

Vera Novomlinova

Service: Laser hair removal

  

Just had a consultation and my first session on legs and arms. I am blown away
by the professionalism of the staff, the cleanliness of the space and overall
quality of my experience.

  

The manager Jasmine, who is friendly and very experienced in her field helped
me with all my questions and was very informative of different options.
Maayan, the esthetician, is great at what she does! I can tell that I’m in
great hands when she does my laser. Definitely the best treatment I’ve had so
far, speaking from experience. Hoping for great results!

  

I appreciated that the environment at Laser Love was so positive and
supportive, genuinely caring to improve the quality of life of its clients.

  

I’m looking forward to continuing my treatments at Laser Love!

Chani

Service: Laser hair removal, HydraFacial

  
So I definitely went into my appointment thinking the whole “painless hair
removal” thing was a myth. I mean I’d been doing laser for 2 years prior and
know what to expect when going into a session. This process completely blew me
away, I wasn’t holding onto the table for dear life. It was actually quite
enjoyable. It’s a gradual heat unlike other machines I’ve used where it feels
like a match strike every zap.  
  
I also got the hydro facial w dermaplaning and wow when I tell you I was a new
person leaving that appt. We did boosters and exfoliating and it’s still soft
as a baby’s ass a week later.

Pearl Mamiye

Service: Laser hair removal

experience during my visit. Her professionalism, attention to detail, and warm
